attributes.action: Call an election rather than hand over the Premiership
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Blair was elected to a third term as premier on the understanding that he would remain in office for the full term. Rather than hand over the leadership of the country he should allow the electorate to chose the next Prime Minister.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
